summary: An ordinance relating to and appropriating $2768.79 from the General Fund (1933 Building Department Budget Item - Fire Station and site - Magnolia Bluff) in to the "Washington Emergency Relief Administration Fund"; providing for certain expenditures as a relief measure in connection with the completion of fire station at 34th Avenue West near McGraw Street; providing for the necessary funds therefor by appropriation from the said "Washington Emergency Relief Administration Fund" and reducing appropriation made by Ordinance No. 63398.
